Detailed Description

template<typename T, typename ALLOCATOR = CDS_DEFAULT_ALLOCATOR>
struct cds::details::deferral_deleter< T, ALLOCATOR >

Deferral removing of the object of type T. Helper class.

Member Function Documentation

template<typename T , typename ALLOCATOR = CDS_DEFAULT_ALLOCATOR>
static void cds::details::deferral_deleter< T, ALLOCATOR >::free ( T *  p ) [inline, static]

Frees the object p.

Caveats: this function uses temporary object of type cds::details::Allocator<T, ALLOCATOR> to free the node p. So, the node allocator should be stateless. It is standard requirement for std::allocator class objects.

Do not use this function directly.
